description.en: Design an algorithm to encode a list of strings to a string and decode it back.
description.zh-CN: [题目271] Design an algorithm to encode a list of strings to...
description.zh-TW: [題目271] Design an algorithm to encode a list of strings to...
description.ja: [問題271] Design an algorithm to encode a list of strings to...
description.es: [Problema 271] Design an algorithm to encode a list of strings to...
description.de: [Problem 271] Design an algorithm to encode a list of strings to...
description.fr: [Problème 271] Design an algorithm to encode a list of strings to...

explanation.en: APL solution for Encode and Decode Strings. Uses tally (≢) to count array length. Uses iota (⍳) to generate index ranges or find element positions. Uses enclose (⊂) to wrap elements or disclose (⊃) to unwrap/extract. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
explanation.zh-CN: Encode and Decode Strings 的 APL 解决方案。使用 tally (≢) 计算数组长度。使用 iota (⍳) 生成索引范围或查找元素位置。使用封闭 (⊂) 包装元素或展开 (⊃) 解包/提取。实现使用 APL 的面向数组原语进行简洁表达。
explanation.zh-TW: Encode and Decode Strings 的 APL 解決方案。使用 tally (≢) 計算陣列長度。使用 iota (⍳) 生成索引範圍或查找元素位置。使用封閉 (⊂) 包裝元素或展開 (⊃) 解包/提取。實現使用 APL 的面向陣列原語進行簡潔表達。

Uses enclose (⊂) to wrap elements or disclose (⊃) to unwrap/extract. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
